testsuite.name: Search and add XL size shirt to cart on Wrangler website

testcase.name: Search for solid blue shirt, verify XL size availability, add to cart and verify
testcase.classname: Search and add XL size shirt to cart on Wrangler website

failure.message: EXPECTED RESULT: XL size option should be present and selectable. ACTUAL RESULT: No matching products found; size options absent; XL not available.

property.name: Proofs Base Folder, includes screenshots, recording, netwrok logs, api logs, sec logs, accessibility logs
plan
property.value: 1. Navigate to https://www.wrangler.in and verify the homepage loads successfully. 2. Click on the Search icon and verify the search input field becomes visible. 3. Enter "solid blue shirt" into the search bar and press Enter, then verify that search results are displayed. 4. Click on the first matching product from the search results and verify that the Product Detail Page (PDP) is displayed. 5. Check for XL size availability on the PDP and verify that the XL size option is present and selectable. 6. Select the XL size option. 7. Click the Add to Cart button and verify that the product is added to the cart successfully. 8. Navigate to the cart page and verify that the cart page loads. 9. Validate the cart contents: product name matches, size is XL, quantity is 1.

testcase.system-out: Final Response: Test failed: Expected XL size option to be available and selectable on the Product Detail Page, but the page displayed a 'No matching products found' message with no size options. XL size availability assertion failed.
